name: 黃銘智
objective: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
schedule:
1 Introduction to CAID and it’s Application
2 Basic surface construction and application
Basic surface construction and merge
Protrusion & Cut using quilt
3 Theory of surface modeling
4 Definitions of datum point and curve
5 Boundary surface construction techniques
6 The optional definitions of surface construction by Bndry. Surface
Boundary surface construction tools
The optional definitions of boundary surface:
Surface information and analysis
7 Spring Vocation
8 Manipulating surfaces
Transforming surfaces feature
Trimming and extending surface
9 Shell and Rounds using quilted surface
Top-down and Bottom-up design approaches
10 Modeling the part with external references
(Modeling in assembly mode)
11 Data exchange and work with imported data.
12 Advanced duplications of features
Group (Pattern and Copy)
13 Advanced modeling tools:
Rib and Tweak (Offset, Draft, Lip,……)
Surface replacements and patches
14 Geometry fail resolving
Menu of geom. Fail resolve
Review of parents/children relationship
Redefine, reroute, reorder & insert mode
15 Relations application
16 Layer setting and application
17 Engineering information setup
18 Final Exam.
